originalText.text: Best Doctor Ever . She has changed my life for the better. I can finally breathe . Did not want a Nose Job all i wanted was to fix my nose to breathe and all i can say is even when allergy season comes i can still inhale through both of my nostrils . Most amazing feeling . Never realized how bad it was for me the way i was breathing especially when allergy season came and now i can always breathe . Also realized why i had to chew with my mouth open. People take for granted that you breathe through your nose while you chew with your mouth closed. She did an amazing Job . Wish I could give her 10 stars and she is so nice . Her staff is also amazing they are all so nice. Its a pleasure talking with Julianna and Melissa.

originalText.text: Dr. Klausner is a fantastic surgeon and I'm so glad I found her! I first saw her in 2021 for a consult and needed to take some time to think about going through with the surgery proposed (septoplasty, turbinate reduction, fracture repairs) and explore other options. I ended up going back to Dr. Klausner in 2022 because I felt she was the best out there and I needed this surgery. She is extremely detailed in her notes and explained every little detail to me, which I appreciate. Post-op she took the time to check in and make sure I was okay and even called me at night when she knew I was feeling nauseous. I also had weekly office visits to ensure I was healing properly and we’re both very happy with the results. Overall she's a compassionate and skilled doctor and I would recommend her to anyone.

originalText.text: Dr. Klausner is WONDERFUL (and so is her staff!) My daughter wanted a nose-job by a woman..so we interviewed several female doctors in NYC and Dr. Klausner was by far the kindest, most patient, and most thorough person we saw. We chose to go with her and the entire process was super positive - from the pre-op visits, to the surgery, to the post- op -- Dr. Klausner is wonderfully caring and invested in her patients. I highly recommend her (and plan to use her when I need some work done for myself :)

originalText.text: Dr. Klausner is hands down the best!  She performed a sinus surgery and straightened my septum in 2017 and I could not be happier with the result.  Dr. Klausner truly listens to her patients and provides expert guidance and thorough explanations for her recommended approach.  When I saw her the day following my surgery she gave me a gentle face wash all around the area and I could've cried it felt so nice.  Her follow up with me was impeccable.  She took great care of me through my entire recovery journey.  Can not recommend Dr. Klausner enough!!

originalText.text: Dr. Lee Ann Klausner is an excellent doctor. Her work is perfection. I have been consistantly happy with each procedure she has done for me. Dr. Klausner is very compassionate and spends time explaining every thing to you. Her staff is wonderful too! I have recommended Dr. Klausner to many of my friends and they continue to go to her and thank me. I am so happy that I found Dr. Klausner.
